'''1.12.1''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released on September 2–3, 2019,<ref>{{tweet|Mega_Spud|1168922739387916291|We're releasing a Minecraft hotfix today to address some nasty bugs - here's the 1.12.1 changelog: We hope to have this out ASAP but please note the time taken to publish to all platform stores may vary!|September 3, 2019}}</ref> which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360032928992-Minecraft-1-12-1-Bedrock-|title=Minecraft - 1.12.1 (Bedrock)|date=September 3, 2019}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed players getting stuck on "Generating World" when loading into a world while located in [[the End]]. ({{bug|MCPE-49778}})
* Fixed an issue that caused many players on Nintendo Switch not being able to sign in to their Microsoft Account. ({{bug|MCPE-34662}})
* Multiple [[ender dragon]]s can no longer spawn at once in the End. ({{bug|MCPE-37590}})
